chapters.title: Prologue: Lightnings
chapters.info: Muradin, p. 37 (33)—Man who was to succeed Suladric as chief of the Shaido Aiel. He went to Rhuidean at the same time Rand did. Rand saw Muradin while inside the ter'angreal; he had gouged his own eyes out, and was rapidly dying inside the columns. He never emerged. See also Couladin; Sevanna; Suladric.
